website_summaries.verdict: Choose this wallet if you find traditional women's wallets too large and bulky. It's small enough to fit in most bags but spacious enough to fit necessities.
pros: A gorgeous wallet that features a tri-color design with a compact bifold build
Though it fits easily in a bag or pocket, it still boasts room for bills and 6 cards
cons: Though it has a coin compartment, it's too small to hold a lot of change, and the zipper is difficult to maneuver
Not the best choice if you need a larger wallet

customer_reviews.title: It fits so much!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest wallet! I have been trying to downsize my bags (first time ever) and needed a smaller wallet (also first time ever) to help with this change. I have been so surprised that I am enjoying this small wallet along with my new bags. This wallet holds everything that my full size wallets held. All of my cards fit and several slots have 2-3 cards inside with plenty of room to slide them in or out. It is not bulky and it has no problem snapping closed with everything I have in it. It is a must have for smaller bags!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberleigh

customer_reviews.title: STOP SHOPPING FOR A WALLET - HERE IT IS.
customer_reviews.text: This is a purchase that exceeds my expectations, and I'm so pleased!! The leather is of good quality, soft, and sturdy, the colors are rich, construction looks very good (I haven't used the wallet yet), the styling makes this more than just a card and money holder, and it holds just enough cards, money (bills), and coins for most women who like an organized wallet that can also serve as a small purse/taxi wallet. And personally, I'm delighted that the details of my new wallet (colors and the gold zipper teeth detail) looks quite nice with my new "Happy Birthday!" Kate Spade bag.
customer_reviews.author: tilzey

customer_reviews.title: Small purse? Great wallet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its tiny, its pretty, but it holds a LOT and is still a small footprint. I love everything about this wallet, and I've been looking for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl from Manassas

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love this cute little wallet. The sellers image show it as being rather large, but it's quite petite. It comes in an embroidered black box with tissue paper which gives it an elegant kind of vibe. It holds 8 cards, has a zipper on the back for a few coins, but isn't too stiff as the material seems very conditioned.
customer_reviews.author: Angelfalls85

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Best quality product I’ve bought from anywhere in a long time. I’ve had it for 10 months and never switched to another. It’s like the day it arrived. Not a single scratch, scuff, tear. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: NanK

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought two more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my daughters for Christmas. I was a little skeptical because of the low price, but boy was I pleasantly surprised how nice the wallet was when it arrived. It looks and feels much more expensive than it is. The styling is adorable, the leather is soft and feels substantial, the card holders are easy to get cards in and out of yet hold the cards well, and it's a perfect size to hold cash without having to struggle like you do with some smaller wallets! I also am thrilled it's got RFID blocking. Just the perfect little wallet!
customer_reviews.author: P. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: They say you get what you pay for....but in this instance, this little wallet is awesome and inexpensive! Perfect size for a small crossbody bag. Nice look and feel 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always putting my ID and debit card in my pocket instead of lugging around my purse or awkwardly holding my wallet so finally got a little wallet to just put in my back pocket to hold essentials I need for everyday :) I love this little thing and is amazing quality!!
customer_reviews.author: supergirl

customer_reviews.title: New favorite wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Pebble Blue Wallet. Very true to color. Doesn't have an overwhelming leather smell. I wanted a compact wallet where I could easily see my bills and cards. It fits in even the smallest of my purses and is bright enough that I can find it in my larger purses.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Hugely grateful for this tiny wallet!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something really small and compact to keep my license and cards in. I found this and was pleased it fit my needs, as well as being RFID protected. The color matched exactly what I saw online and everything fit snugly without being too tight. I love the size of it-I was actually able to put it in my front pants pocket! I may be ordering these as gifts for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: wordscrafter

customer_reviews.title: Beware the zipper
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is unbelievably cute and I love the color block pattern (I got the white, gray, orange/brown one). My only issue is the useless zipper for decoration... why is this a thing?? It already scratched my phone and sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this wallet. Perfect for times when I don't want to carry a purse. I can stick my license, credit cards and money in this and stash it in my pocket. Love the color!!! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Great small size. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Light blue is a pretty color. It’s thin and well made. Dollars fit easily. Cards fit easily too and don’t slip down. It fits the main cards I need so I can transfer it to my clutch purse when I need it for evening out. Just what I wAnted.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgoer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong odor
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is super cute, it fits everything my bigger zip around wallet held which was a major concern of mine. I noticed a very strong smell from the wallet while I was putting my items in it. I didn’t think much of it since it’s a new wallet and sometimes you just need to let it air out. I noticed the smell on my hands after touching the wallet as well. I had it sitting on the end of my desk and hours later I could still smell the strong odor so bad it was giving me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for... I love it.... The color, texture, size...... awesome
customer_reviews.author: pamela givens

customer_reviews.title: Big use out of a small wallet
customer_reviews.text: Best wallet ever! I wanted something smaller for only my necessities and I found out this holds more than I expected! Holds all my cards and more without bulking out like other small wallets. Best and my most favorite part is, you know when you buy a new wallet and you put your cards in it and then can’t get them out because the slots are too tight? Doesn’t happen here! I can slide my credit cards in and out with ease and they aren’t too loose so the cards fall out either. This is literally my miracle wallet. Will purchase again depending on its life span! We will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Ghost wallets
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of them, never got the real product, just 2 empty boxes.
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit at first, but after one day, I can already tell it's wearing in good. I love the colors, and it feels like really good quality. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It is fine for a night out but not substantial enough as ...
customer_reviews.text: As my handbags have gradually gotten smaller, so has my need for smaller wallets. This is more of a billfold with pocket slots for cards, with a rather small zip section for just a few coins. It is fine for a night out but not substantial enough as an everyday wallet for my needs. The red color is very pretty and it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Scrima

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, petite, and functional. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I love a small billfold that will fit in my pocket (I hate carrying a purse) but will still hold all I need it to hold, eg a 1/2 doz credit/membership cards, insurance cards, drivers license, money & change. This billfold is actually a smidge roomier than my beloved Loris that just fell apart, and almost as small so just perfect...and pretty...and real leather at a fraction of the price. And so many colors to choose from, it's hard to pick just one! Very pleased. I would definitely buy this brand again. I think it's a steal even if it doesn't last as long.
customer_reviews.author: cynb

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this wallet. It's small, but I needed to downsize my wallet. I like that on the inside the card slots face inward instead of outward like many wallets. When they face outward there is the possibility of them falling out the open end. The zippered change purse is very small, but I don't need to keep a lot of change, just enough to make change. I love the card slot under the front flap because when I open the wallet my license and main card are right there. Beautiful stitching on this leather wallet. So far very happy. Takes up so little room in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great compact wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great small wallet, fits perfectly in my smaller purses. I like it so much I’ve retired my normal (larger) wallet in favor of this one! Happy that it’s RFID blocking as well. I don’t have any issues with the quality, however I do a lot of mobile paying so I don’t have to open it all that frequently. I got the black/white/taupe with the zipper edge and it matches almost every purse I have since it’s so neutral. It holds more than I thought it would (but I don’t think I have more than 7 cards in there total, plus my ID)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren_Schuby

customer_reviews.title: perfect little wallet!
customer_reviews.text: this wallet is the perfect size and it comes in so many colors making it easy to match to any bag. it's easy to get my cards out and it's got a finger cut out on the id window so i don't have to struggle to get it out at the doctor's office anymore. i open it upside down constantly and none of my bills or coupons fall out. i really couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I had used only a card holder but I wanted a small wallet that could keep me organized but not take up too much space. This is perfect! There are 7 slots for cards but the pockets in the back on both sides can be doubled up if necessary! Currently I have 8 cards in here and it folds up very thin! The coin pocket on the back is a good size in my opinion—small but good enough for the amount of coins I carry. Overall, a very good, affordable wallet for your essentials!
customer_reviews.author: W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet, Great Deal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this little wallet. I purchased it because I have a very small Dooney bag and my regular Dooney wallet took up too much space. I thought I would pick up an inexpensive wallet just to use with this one small purse but I like the wallet so much that I won't be going back to my Dooney. It has plenty of slots of cards, my drivers' license slips in/out easily for those times when I have to actually present it and there's plenty of room for all of that money I have. It folds nicely and is a great size. I also love the weird colors.
customer_reviews.author: Faith B

customer_reviews.title: Very compact
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I want to have protected credit cards, but the wallet I had was too large for my purse. This is very small and although it doesn't hold all my cards, it holds the most important and I have the less used rewards and bonus cards in a separate holder. The change pocket is very small and not easy to get change out of, but the rest of the wallet is very convenient and stays in a small pocket in my purse so I have to problems finding it. It seems to be very well made. and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: PHelmer

customer_reviews.title: Stylight and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great little wallet. I wanted to downsize from a wallet that was large enough to hold a checkbook. This is less than half the size so I was a little concerned about fitting everything in. I love the color blocking design and the zipper detail. Although it is a little tight for fitting a number of bills in at full length you can easily fold them in half instead. There is plenty of space for the cards I need to carry and so far the zipper detail has not caught on anything in my purse. So glad I went with this wallet, it gave me a good reason to go shopping for a cute, smaller purse :)
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compact Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with this wallet. I wanted a turquoise color so I'm glad that the wallet's color was the same as the color that is shown in the picture instead of "green" (as it was named in the description). I believe that the internal card slots could be a bit less deep though to make it easier to remove the cards. Since the slot openings are oriented in the direction of the wallet's fold instead of "up" toward an open side, there is no danger of a card falling out if the slots were made very slightly shallower.
customer_reviews.author: NotAPartyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Average Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is very beautiful wallet. I wish it had more slots for cards though and the larger space for coins. I gave it 3 stars because it smells too strong and the smell won't go away.
customer_reviews.author: Viixen87

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is SO nice for the price! Do yourself a favor and buy it! I have been on the search for a small wallet for a while now. I have even bought another one that was terrible, so my search began again. That's when I ran across this little gem. It is a perfect size. Looks much more expensive, down to the stitching. The leather feels so soft yet sturdy. I want to buy it in more colors. That's how much I love it. The dark pink is absolutely beautiful though.
customer_reviews.author: Just another customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, Great look
customer_reviews.text: Ooh I’m a little bit in love with this wallet. It’s exactly the right size to hold my credit-card-sized cards, ID, and various receipts etc. The cash and coin slots are good should I need them. And the whole thing lies flat enough to fit in a super tiny women’s pants back pocket. The color and leather quality are top notch and the zipper styling makes it unique. Perfectly suited for my needs at a price that makes it a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Salemka

customer_reviews.title: Not same as described in add
customer_reviews.text: Cute wallet for a child. I was anticipating a larger size. Can not get credit cards or loose change to fit. Think I’ll give it to my grand daughter for her birthday
customer_reviews.author: Martha Stone

customer_reviews.title: Compact, unusual, made well, package beautifully 5 stars in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet! It is so cute but practical and holds everything yet stays closed and flat looking. I loved it so much I bought another for a gift. Now thinking Christmas and going to order more. I get so many compliments on it. I also want a back up so when I wear this one out I will have one. However it is so sturdy and made well that it won't wear out for sometime. It also comes I such a lovely packaging that when you received it he box makes you feel you have received something very expensive. Can you tell I am so glad I found this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hunter

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this little wallet! I started buying mini backpacks as my every day bag and my last wallet was too big and the long style barely fit in my small bags so I bought this wallet. It's been awhile and it is still in perfect condition. It's adorable and functional. It also came in a great little gift box.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! This is a great little wallet. I could fit all of my stuff from my previous wallet into this one without making it bulky. Several cards can fit in one card slot, but still be easily removed. The wallet is well made and the leather is soft. Love the colors. Totally worth the money. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JB4Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little wallet and have gotten lots of compliments on it. I looked for a VERY long time for a small wallet to replace a card-holder-type wallet I've had for years. This one is small enough to fit in my back pocket or jacket pocket if I'm just running into the store, but large enough to hold bills without folding them. The quality is great, it does NOT look cheap and it's super cute. NO complaints and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2furfaces

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my wallet. I've have always carried the clutch style. But since I don't carry a bunch of pictures any more, I decided to order a smaller one. As I was scrolling through all the wallets, this small envelope style caught my eye and I knew this was the one for me. I love the style and the color and I like the security. Everything is organized, nice and neat. My purse even feels lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie F.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is very pretty , I wish the slots were different though there’s two of them that are so deep my cards sink to the bottom. I like it when you are able to at least see the top part / color of the card for easy grabbing, I feel like maybe this is a date night wallet or for people with not so many cards, theres a coin slot but hardly doubt you can fit maybe a dollar worth of change in there. I will update with durability in a few weeks .
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to a crossbody bag and wanted something that could hold all my cards and wasn't long or bulky. I read a ton of the reviews and settled on this one. It is perfect! The size is just right and fits in back pocket with no issue, or into the side pockets of my gym leggings. It's well made and has PLENTY of room on the inside for cards and cash. The change pocket is a little small, but I don't carry much change on me anyways. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: moe_91

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a Terrific Price!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I was looking for something small. When the wallet came, I was astonished at the quality for the price. It also arrived in a nice box. This would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: CarolSchrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great small wallet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these wallets to give as Christmas gifts during Cyber-Monday. I loved them so much I kept one!!! The wallet is well made, stylish, and compact. They are boxed really nicely and will make a great presentation on opening on Christmas. This wallet will fit in a back pocket or a small clutch/cross body easily. Now I need to order another one for the one I snagged!!
customer_reviews.author: M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet
customer_reviews.text: This enables you to downsize on the road without giving up any essentials. This small wallet easily hides away into your bags with all your cash and cards in tow. In addition to 6 card slots, an ID window, and two gusseted pockets, this wallet is equipped with RFID-blocking technology, so you can rest assured knowing your credit card information is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mythily

customer_reviews.title: Great little wallet
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller wallet for my backpack. It's kind of hard to tell, with a lot of the ones I found, what the size really is. I liked the style of this one. I liked that it came in so many colors. It's a good little wallet. It's smaller than I thought it was going to be. I realized I kept too much stuff in my wallet when I switched to this one haha. Overall I would recommend if you need a light and sturdy small wallet.
customer_reviews.author: KatyLeigh

customer_reviews.title: I Actually Love This Little Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, when it arrived, I was SURE that cash money would not fit in that little wallet without being turning into origami. I was wrong. It's a perfect fit for paper money. I love this little wallet. It fits in a bag well. It fits my pocket well. It's got plenty of card slots. It's super cute. I recommend it for anyone who wants a small wallet.
customer_reviews.author: English L. Eaves

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the front pocket of my jeans!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little wallet! The colors are vivid and it’s very well made. It fits in the front pocket of my jeans! I hate to carry a big purse in the grocery store. Don’t have to now and my hands are still free. I love it so much and the price is so reasonable I bought one for each of my closest friends for Christmas. It comes in so many different colors, they all get their own color. I’m sure they will love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: L. Green

customer_reviews.title: RFID Blocking - Doesn't Really Work
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute wallet... but I shouldn't be able use my RFID keycard to get into my work building while the card is in the wallet. That seems like it's not working well or doesn't have blocking on all sides. If marketed as a cute basic wallet, I'd give it 5 stars, but it's marketed as a scan blocker, it doesn't do what is advertised in the heading.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wallet which was small enough to fit in my small purses but would hold my credit cards, cash and coins plus a few of the store bonus cards. This wallet does all that and it is very stylish. I got the one which is black, white, and gray with small sliver studs. I use it daily and it seems to be holding up well to being taken in and out of a tight space, opened and closed. I may get another in a different color pattern just for fun as the price is quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this wallet for our upcoming trip to Paris. I'm carrying a small cross body bag and wanted something to fit euros with extra space for a few cards, museum pass and metro pass. This is perfect. I put euros and change in and it still stays completely flat. It looks so expensive and I love the pink/blush color. It fits in a small bag and leaves room for other necessities. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: D. Scarabino

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well organized. A great small wallet.
customer_reviews.text: It’s new, and I haven’t used it that much, because of sheltering in place. However, my first impression is very favorable. I have been looking for a small, attractive RFID wallet for quite a while. This one got great reviews, and I think it is going to live up to them. I transferred everything I need to carry into this wallet. Everything fits, without pushing the size limits. I love the color, size, and configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Kay

customer_reviews.title: It is an awesome little wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is so cute and exactly what I needed. I get compliments on it all the time. I was worried the zipper detail would catch on things but it doesn't. It is an awesome little wallet. I do wish the card holders were a little tighter. I feel like my cards slide a bit, but other than that I would buy again if i needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. Has enough slots for my debit/credit cards. Holds my cash & drivers license. Also fits in the back pocket of my jeans. I hate carrying a purse all the time. This wallet is the perfect wallet for me. I love it!! I'd recommend it to a friend or anyone. Perfect😊
customer_reviews.author: SHELIA M RAKES

customer_reviews.title: Pretty,well made, compact wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as Christmas gifts so I really can't review the product. However, they appear very nice.They are small, compact, but hold about 6 cards, a photo ID, and money. My Mom was looking for a small every day wallet. I would use this wallet for travel when I don't want to bring it all with me or if I wanted something small to put in a small bag when I'm on a bus trip for the day or visiting flea markets. I can't give 5 stars until the wallets have been used.4 stars for quality and appearane. Nicely boxed,shipped very promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Green Mt girl

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the wallet materials. It is slightly smaller than I anticipated and I do wish the credit card slots were graduated to make it easier to remove the cards. I also need something else to contain receipts and coupons. I chose the blue color and it is true to the picture on Amazon so that was also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: perfect compact wallet
customer_reviews.text: I feel liberated from my former unnecessarily bulky wallet. I love red, but the color on this one is a tad too dark and the leather is a drop too shiny. After receiving it, I noticed another almost identical one with better color choices and less shiny leather. I already used this one so I'm sticking with it. Love the basic compact design.
customer_reviews.author: inferiordecorator

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is awesome. I love the fact that it’s smaller sized, yet it can hold change, bills and a bunch of cards. My old wallet didn’t even have an ID card slot. This one has it and it’s a cute style, with many options to choose from. I recommend it and would even consider getting a different color or back up in case they ever decide to stop selling them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like this little wallet. It fits in my pocket and it’s attractive. It comes in different color blocks. There are plenty of card slots and a see thru pocket for a license as well as a zippered coin Slot on the back. When opened there is a bill slot running the length of the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is more than I was expecting. I read the comments before ordering so I already had high expectations, which were met when received. My old wallet was too bulky for an everyday use so I decided to try this out and I’m glad I did. All my cards fit, plus cash and it does not feel thick or anything like that. I do wish that the slot for coins were a little bigger but it’s something I can deal with. If you’re considering buying this, DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Sustaita

customer_reviews.title: Dont think... Just buy it if you are looking for a mini wallet
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of mini sized wallets and have bought several ones. By far this is the best. It looks very small, i even wondered if it would hold all the cards that I need. But I was very surprised when I i was able to fit in like 15 cards! Quality is good too! Color is true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: sun'n'moon

customer_reviews.title: It’s Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!! The perfect size. You can hold 12 cards including a space for your ID, bills and coins!! Not bulky at all. Truth be told I thought the color was an Orange color when I ordered it. It’s still a pretty brown color. What I like most it takes up no space in any bag! Happy purchase 🤗
customer_reviews.author: A-Rain

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this wallet. I was impressed the moment I opened the very nice box it came in. Nicely made, looks very rich looking. Perfect size. I hate large wallets. The smell of real leather is great too. I'm impressed and will buy more of these as gifts. High recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice leather and beautiful colors -- perfect size for me
customer_reviews.text: I had a mini trifold before -- this is a bit larger but I like how flat it folds. It holds just what I need. The grey with natural leather is beautiful. It matches my purses and slips in my smaller crossbody purse easily. The square size is easier to find that my mini-wallet in my purse :) QUALITY BETTER THAN EXPECTED -- recommended!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cyn1492

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional purse
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. It looks and feels like quality materials. I like the envelope look and the zipper teeth edging. Both the snap and zipper on the change compartment work fine. I prefer a small wallet, to keep me from cluttering it up and to fit better in my handbag. This meets both of those needs.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't officially used it yet but did transfer all my stuff to it. I bought it because it appears to be small enough to put into a pocket when I don't want to take my purse with me and it fit into my jeans pocket just fine. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: cz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet came in on time and it’s super cute. It holds cash perfectly and even leaves some room to hold a lot of bills. The coin pocket goes deep enough to hold a bunch of coins but it doesn’t look lumpy. It holds the cards perfectly but the only thing is the card slots go a little deep so my cards slide down into them every now and then and I can’t see them. Not a big deal for me but just a heads up. Overall it’s a pretty awesome wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: good wallet; great seller
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wallet. much smaller than my previous wallet (exactly the size I was looking for--fits perfectly in my coat pocket). RFID blocking makes me feel safe in large cities and tourist areas. I keep 10 cards in here and it still doesn't look bulky. UPDATE: a few months after buying this wallet the clasp on the wallet broke. I contacted the seller about the issue and they responded within 24 hours, offering to send me a replacement wallet at no charge (including free shipping!)
customer_reviews.author: James w buchele

customer_reviews.title: Very nice size, and color!
customer_reviews.text: I got this wallet because I was tired of carrying around my credit card in an RFID blocking pouch within a normal wallet. I really like the style of this, and it's not too large, so I can carry it in my backpack while going to classes! It has just enough pockets within it for me without being too much. It's a very nice and well made wallet, I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: White Bark Clan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small
customer_reviews.text: I always go for a smaller wallet since I don't like carrying a purse, and this is a very stylish upgrade from the basic black foldable wallet I carried before. It holds everything I need and fits in my back pocket--it is a little bulky when sitting, but that's to be expected. I've been using it for nine months now and it's held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Gets messy easily because of design
customer_reviews.text: Gets messy easily because of design, little card space and it’s hard to get the cards out when you are in a hurry. Also two of the pockets aren’t larger but they just get whatever you put it in there jammed in there
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cague

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is super cute and fits nicely in a small handbag. The only thing I did not care for is the ID/Driver’s License slot, it is hard to see through. Meaning, if you have to show your ID for anything, it will have to be removed....not a huge deal, just a FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Koppes

customer_reviews.title: Great little wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I dont carry cash, I just wanted something big enough to hold my cards, but small enough to fit in my little purse. This was it. It's the perfect size, good quality. The snap never pops open. My cards slide in and out easily, without falling out when I dont want them. For how tiny it is it holds a lot. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lecks & Brody

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my new wallet. It is very compact yet useful. Its size allows me to carry a smaller purse. I would like it to have , maybe two. More credit card slots, but then it would begin to bulk it up. I live it just the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: BoatDrinks

customer_reviews.title: Cute little wallet that serves a greater purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I was using the metal card holders which I really liked. But the card sleeves on the inside tore up to easy. Since this wallet was leather, I thought it would hold up better. It has the RFID blocking built into the wallet. It's about the same size as the others, so I can still carry it in my pocket. So far I love it. The only thing I'm not sure about is the snap closure. Seems good now, just hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but this wallet exceeded my expectations. I have a regular sized designer wallet, but I wanted an inexpensive smaller wallet for whenever I use my small body bags. This one perfectly matches my Rebecca Minkoff purse as shown in the picture. I love the design and the quality is great! Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet! It doesn't have the real leather smell but it doesn't need to for this price and I doubt it's real leather but feels as smooth as real. It was perfect for when I lived in Spain for 3 months. I could hold all my cards, cash and euro coins. Great value!!
customer_reviews.author: kbloggs

customer_reviews.title: Great for a while...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great from the start. Unfortunately as time pass, the card pockets got loose and just wasn’t holding on to the cars anymore. Still works fine and no other issue but it could be an annoyance for some of you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Callmedianayeah

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a thin wallet that I could walk around with but everything I looked at was very "blah". This wallet is so bright & beautiful and thin. I love it. Fits everything I need to have on me without the bulge. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette M.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, great size, great organization & great look!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet - it is small but not too small. I actually love that it is so compact. It weights zero so adding it to your purse adds no weight yet your credit or ID cards are organized. I have given these wallets as gifts & we all love the RFID factor even if we don't know when it saves our information - we know it will. Great product & so attractive.
customer_reviews.author: TNPeg

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight :)
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today, and was pleasantly surprised to like it more than I hoped to. It really appears to be a really nice piece: well made, good quality; a nice deep red outside with a pale gold satin-like inside; I say appears, because I haven’t put it to use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Kelly

customer_reviews.title: What You'd Expect
customer_reviews.text: The price of the wallet matches the craftsmanship of the wallet. Stitches are all in place. Colors are as depicted. Quality of material is terrible. I expected that for the cost though so am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this wallet yesterday and I absolutely love it. I have a large MK wallet that’s too big for my smaller purses and a small MK wallet that’s too small to hold all my cards so I was looking for something in between. As soon as I received it I transferred everything to this wallet and I can’t complain. Plus it somewhat matches the new Coach crossbody that I bought. The only minor complain that I have is that for the color description it said it was a light green but it’s nowhere near that. It’s more of an aqua blue. Other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! The colors are true to the picture and its so cute! I was using a big wallet that wouldn't fit in my smaller bags so I decided to try out a smaller one. And now there is no turning back! Fits all of my cards comfortably, which I was worried about, and you can carry cash and coins comfortably. The fact that it is RFID blocking is great too! For the price you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and compact!
customer_reviews.text: Five of my friends have bought one of these and we love them. Love the security piece, love that it is smaller so I am only carrying around what I really need, leather is really soft and cards and cash ACTUALLY fit nicely in the slots.
customer_reviews.author: V. R. VonGunten

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Compact
customer_reviews.text: I had been on a search for a compact wallet that would fit into a small handbag, leaving space for other items. This absolutely works! The zipper detail doesn't catch on fabric, which was a concern. I'm impressed with the leather, design and craftsmanship of this little gem! Completely satisfied with my purchase, I am considering purchasing another color.
customer_reviews.author: tandw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet! It’s small enough I can fit in my jeans pocket when I do not want to carry a purse. Snap closure works great. Holds the basics without the bulk. Colors as shown and very cute. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet fits nicely in my pocket. It is a quality wallet, just perfect for someone whom does not want to carry a purse everywhere. It is RFID blocking safe so they can't steal you credit card information. The color I purchased is a vibrant red, true to the color on the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: The wallet seems to be made of good quality and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is very cute. It fits all my needs. I needed a small wallet with card slots, an ID slot, and space for bills. It meets the criteria perfectly. The wallet seems to be made of good quality and is sturdy. Looks like it will hold up over time. The only reason for the 4 star rating is that one of the reasons I bought this wallet was the color. It appeared to match a purse i was buying perfectly. However the wallet is not as bright as the picture so it does not match 100%. But I will keep it because it matches close enough and is still a good wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great little wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little wallet. Holds everything you actually need and fits in a small purse quite easily. One of the other reviews gave a tip about not putting any cards in the last slots (just doubling them in the other slots) and that works very well (allows the wallet to fold better). It’s nice to have a mini wallet that also holds bills and coins.
customer_reviews.author: SKF

customer_reviews.title: Well made, stylish, and compact
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! It’s compact enough to fit in a small purse or even my coat pocket, but holds all the essentials inside. I also get tons of compliments on it, so even though it’s cheap it’s not cheap looking. I’ve been using it regularly for a few months now and there’s no sign of wear or tear. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet because I bought a new purse and my old wallet was too big. I was reluctant to buy a wallet online without being able to see the quality, but I am very happy with this purchase. This wallet is great! I thought it wouldn't be big enough for all my cards, but most of them fit and the wallet snaps closed and doesn't bulge at all. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my niece as an extra little wallet for a small purse or pocket. Just large enough for a few important cards and paper bills. Love the leather and RFID protection. Great color choices also.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha103

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, a little smaller than I thought and I wanted a small wallet. I’d give this size to a kid to play with
customer_reviews.author: MeganU

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than you would think!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a billfold to slip into tiny formal bags. This slim little wallet holds more than you would think when you look at it -- as long as you only need it to hold bills, a little change and no more than 2 or 3 credit cards -- and the price is very reasonable. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. K. Rush

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is perfect if you need the right size and has a pouch for your coins. I really enjoy the material of this leather, the color and the snapping mechanism. It is small enough to fit inside my back denim jean pocket. Defintely will fit your large and small purses. Has slots for your cards and ID compartment.
customer_reviews.author: A.Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Small and oh so cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wallet to slide easily into a crossbody bag for an upcoming trip. It's cute, functional and holds everything you need. There are just enough card holders, cash easily fits in the bill holder. Nicely made and appears quite sturdy. It arrived quickly in a very nice box. Overall pleased with this purchase. If you need something small and useful this is it!
customer_reviews.author: mere

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Small Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Wow, for the price this is a very nice wallet. I was looking for a very small wallet and decided to give this a try. It works perfectly for my purposes. I am very impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: NMJacoby

customer_reviews.title: Classy and compact
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my spouse. It is compact so forces you to be selective in what credit cards and all the extra contraptions that tend to be inserted into a female wallet (although I'm sure they can find a way to jam more cards in....). Stylish and enjoy this particular pattern.
customer_reviews.author: S Wong

customer_reviews.title: Arrived packaged beautifully with its own dust bag
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packaged beautifully with its own dust bag. I’ve yet to use this as it just arrived but the quality feels nice. I’ve been looking for a smaller wallet that wasn’t so bulky to carry in some of my smaller bags. Which after years of carrying larger totes I’m now beginning to like more. There’s plenty of card slots for my major cards and a full size bill holder. Plus I love the color block design.
customer_reviews.author: MissKelly

customer_reviews.title: Worst. I really wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: Worst. I really wanted to like this, but aftter having it for less than a week the zipper wouldn’t close. I figured it was a freak accident so I ordered another - zipper won’t even work coming straight out of the box. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Soft sturdy leather
customer_reviews.text: Cute wallet that fits lots of cards. Compact size can fit into small purses. Nice soft leather and came in a little box.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine W.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS WALLET!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the perfect wallet and finally found it! It meets my expectations for size, credit card holders, bills and change compartments. Best of all it is light weight, very well constructed, and offered in bright fun colors. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Patty W.

product_meta.title: Lavemi RFID Blocking Small Compact Mini Bifold Credit Card Holder Leather Pocket Wallets for Women
feature_bullets: COMPACT - Compact yet small enough to put into your coat,pants pocket.This is a mini size little wallet. Demension: 3.54" x 4.13" x 0.59".
100% Premium Genuine Full Grain Leather with pebbled finish, feels luxury and comfortable.

SAFETY & PRIVACY - Our wallets are equipped with advanced unique proprietary blocking material, which blocks RFID signals and protects the valuable private information stored on RFID chips of your ID and credit cards from unauthorized scans. Shield against electronic pickpocketing with this wallet!
FUNCTIONAL DESIGN - 6 card holder,1 photo slot,1 zippered coin pocket on the back,1 full-length bill section. It stays closed and flat when stuffed.

CONVENIENT - Perfect for Ladies who doesn't like to carry a big wallet around town.Clear layout and bifold design is made for you easy access to cash and credit cards.Comes in a cute Gift Box and ready to be gift for someone who likes compact small wallets.
